description: I'm sure this isn't going to happen for everyone, and to be fair, my laptop is pretty outdated. For me, Yaba Sanshiro crashes when loading an ISO/BIN or when using OpenGL.
It's a bad snap port. Should to have more compatibility with the system. Yabause's still a better option.
summary: Joystick don't set. Directories don't show files

description: For some reason i spent hours trying to get my wired/wireless retrobit control pads to work and it won't detect any input.. Everything works in Yabause (not snap application) but not in Yaba Sanshiro sadly ... I enabled removable media permissions in the snap store and still doesn't work. I guess i'll have to stick with the out-dated yabause from 2014-16 with limited features as its the only one that works with my controllers.
summary: Graphics look better than Yabause, More features BUT (read comments)

description: It works really good, It does not recognize any controller but the Steam Controller , that's the only one that works fine. this is a 5 star emulator, but for that reason I'm giving 4 stars.
No pude hacer andar este emulador ni ninguna
